info.title: Baculum API
info.description: This is the Baculum API documentation.

Device.name: device
Device.description: Storage device (can be used instead drive)

ComponentType.name: component_type
ComponentType.description: Component type: dir, sd, fd or bcons

get.description: Get client list.
Get client by specific Client identifier.
Get 'show clients' bconsole command output for specific client
Get client status for specific client
Get jobs done by specific client
Get list Client files/directories for specific path
Get 'show clients' bconsole command output
Get job list.
Get job by specific Job identifier.

delete.description: Delete job by specific Job identifier.

items.description: Console output from removing specific jobid

get.description: Get 'show jobs' bconsole command output for specific job
Get job resource names (after applying console ACL)

get.summary: Get most recent jobids for job to restore
get.description: Useful for restore. Determines all single jobids required to restore job given in jobname. Besides jobname there are required only two parameters (client OR clientid) AND (fileset OR filesetid)

items.description: List job identifiers to restore job given as jobname

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: Client name (can be used instead clientid)

parameters.name: fileset
parameters.description: FileSet name (can be used instead filesetid)

post.description: Estimate job bytes and files before real job run. There can be used (id OR name) and (clientid OR client)

items.description: Output with estimated bytes and files

parameters.name: create[name]
parameters.description: Job name (can be used instead id)

parameters.name: create[client]
parameters.description: Client name (can be used instead clientid)

post.description: Run job with specific parameters. There can be used (id OR name) and (clientid OR client)

parameters.name: create[name]
parameters.description: Job name (can be used instead id)

parameters.name: create[client]
parameters.description: Client name (can be used instead clientid)

parameters.name: create[storage]
parameters.description: Storage name (can be used instead storageid)

parameters.name: create[pool]
parameters.description: Pool name (can be used instead poolid)

parameters.name: create[fileset]
parameters.description: FileSet name (can be used instead filesetid)

get.description: Get 'show jobs' bconsole command output

get.summary: Show job total bytes and files
get.description: Get total number backed up bytes and files from all jobs. It works also with Console ACL.

parameters.name: create[name]
parameters.description: Job name (can be used instead id)

parameters.name: create[client]
parameters.description: Client name (can be used instead clientid)

parameters.description: Update Volume Pool by Pool identifier

Get specific component config

parameters.description: Config in JSON form to set

parameters.description: Config in JSON form to set

get.description: Get job log for jobid

Get storage status

autoprune.description: Determines if automatic prunning is enabled/disabled

job.description: Job name with date and time

jobstatus.description: Job status. Note, some statuses can be not visible outside (used internally by Bacula)

hasbase.description: Has base jobs, 1 if job uses base job, otherwise 0

hascache.description: Has Bvfs cache, 1 if job has Bvfs cache, otherwise 0

autochanger.description: Determines if storage is autochanger type. 1 if it is autochanger, otherwise 0

maxvoljobs.description: Maximum number of jobs on volume

maxvolfiles.description: Maximum number of files on volume

maxvolbytes.description: Maximum number of bytes on volume

recycle.description: If set to 1 it enables volume recycling

actiononpurge.description: Action on purge to do on volumes

pooltype.description: Pool type. Currently is possible to set only one value: 'Backup'

enabled.description: Determines if volume is enabled or not

firstwritten.description: Date and time first write to volume

lastwritten.description: Date and time last write to volume

voljobs.description: Number of jobs written on volume

volfiles.description: Number of files written on volume

volblocks.description: Number of blocks written on volume

volbytes.description: Number of bytes written on volume

enabled.description: Determines if volume is enabled or not

recycle.description: If set to 1 it enables volume recycling

actiononpurge.description: Action on purge to do on volumes
